metadata.title: CVE-2024-26973 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fat: fix uninitialized field in nostale filehandlesWhen fat_encode_fh_nostale() encodes file handle without a parent itstores only first 10 bytes of the file handle. However the length of thefile handle must be a multiple of 4 so the file handle is actually 12bytes long and the last two bytes remain uninitialized. This is notgreat at we potentially leak uninitialized information with the handleto userspace. Properly initialize the full handle length.
